article_html: Carly Fiorina, the first woman to lead a Fortune 20 company, has announced she’s running for president as a Republican. She also owns two dogs – and two yachts
text: Carly Fiorina, the first woman to lead a Fortune 20 company, has announced she’s running for president as a Republican. She also owns two dogs – and two yachts
title: Carly Fiorina's election resumé: yachts, John McCain and layoffs
